com.webreach.mirth.model.Channel.name: C32 Demographics

properties.property: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?> <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:dss="http://dss.kmr.nhinc.fha.hhs.gov/" xmlns:urn="urn:gov:hhs:fha:nhinc:adapter:fact"> <soapenv:Body> <storeDemographicsFactEvent xmlns="http://dss.kmr.socraticgrid.org/"> <fact> <urn:primaryKey>${PrimaryId}</urn:primaryKey> <urn:historical>false</urn:historical> #foreach( $id in $Ids ) <urn:id> <urn:codeSystem>$id.type</urn:codeSystem> <urn:codeSystemName></urn:codeSystemName> <urn:value>$id.value</urn:value> <urn:displayable>false</urn:displayable> </urn:id> #end <urn:sourceSystem>${message.source}</urn:sourceSystem> <urn:legalName> <urn:firstName>${legalGivenName}</urn:firstName> <urn:middleName>${legalMiddleName}</urn:middleName> <urn:familyName>${legalFamilyName}</urn:familyName> <urn:prefix> <urn:label></urn:label> </urn:prefix> <urn:suffix> <urn:label></urn:label> </urn:suffix> <urn:nameType> <urn:codeSystemName>HL7</urn:codeSystemName> <urn:code>L</urn:code> <urn:label>Legal Name</urn:label> </urn:nameType> </urn:legalName> #foreach( $name in $Names ) <urn:firstName>$name.givenName</urn:firstName> <urn:middleName>$name.middleName</urn:middleName> <urn:familyName>$name.familyName</urn:familyName> <urn:prefix> <urn:codeSystem></urn:codeSystem> <urn:codeSystemName></urn:codeSystemName> <urn:code></urn:code> <urn:label></urn:label> </urn:prefix> <urn:suffix> <urn:codeSystem></urn:codeSystem> <urn:codeSystemName></urn:codeSystemName> <urn:code></urn:code> <urn:label></urn:label> </urn:suffix> <urn:nameType> <urn:codeSystem></urn:codeSystem> <urn:codeSystemName></urn:codeSystemName> <urn:code>$name.type</urn:code> <urn:label>$name.type</urn:label> </urn:nameType> </urn:otherName> #end <urn:motherMaidenName></urn:motherMaidenName> <urn:dateOfBirth>${recordtarget_patientrole_patient_birthtime_attValue}</urn:dateOfBirth> <urn:gender> <urn:codeSystem>${recordtarget_patientrole_patient_administrativegendercode_attCodesystem}</urn:codeSystemName> <urn:codeSystemName>AdministrativeGenderCode</urn:codeSystemName> <urn:code>${recordtarget_patientrole_patient_administrativegendercode_attCode}</urn:code> <urn:label>${recordtarget_patientrole_patient_administrativegendercode_attDisplayname}</urn:label> </urn:gender> <urn:maritalStatus> <urn:codeSystem>${recordtarget_patientrole_patient_maritalstatuscode_attCodesystem}</urn:codeSystem> <urn:codeSystemName>${recordtarget_patientrole_patient_maritalstatuscode_attCodesystemname}</urn:codeSystemName> <urn:code>${recordtarget_patientrole_patient_maritalstatuscode_attCode}</urn:code> <urn:label>${recordtarget_patientrole_patient_maritalstatuscode_attDisplayname}</urn:label> </urn:maritalStatus> <urn:race> <urn:codeSystem>${recordtarget_patientrole_patient_racecode_attCodesystem}</urn:codeSystem> <urn:codeSystemName>${recordtarget_patientrole_patient_racecode_attCodesystemname}</urn:codeSystemName> <urn:code>${recordtarget_patientrole_patient_racecode_attCode}</urn:code> <urn:label>${recordtarget_patientrole_patient_racecode_attDisplayname}</urn:label> </urn:race> <urn:ethnic> <urn:codeSystem>${recordtarget_patientrole_patient_ethnicitycode_attCode}</urn:codeSystem> <urn:codeSystemName>${recordtarget_patientrole_patient_ethnicitycode_attCodesystemname}</urn:codeSystemName> <urn:code>${recordtarget_patientrole_patient_ethnicitycode_attCode}</urn:code> <urn:label>${recordtarget_patientrole_patient_ethnicitycode_attDisplayname}</urn:label> </urn:ethnic> <urn:language> <urn:code>${recordtarget_patientrole_patient_languagecommunication_languagecode_attCode}</urn:code> <urn:label>${recordtarget_patientrole_patient_languagecommunication_languagecode_attCode}</urn:label> </urn:language> #foreach( $tel in $Telcom ) <urn:telecom> <urn:value>$tel.value</urn:value> <urn:telecomType> <urn:codeSystem></urn:codeSystem> <urn:codeSystemName></urn:codeSystemName> <urn:code>$tel.type</urn:code> <urn:label></urn:label> </urn:telecomType> </urn:telecom> #end #foreach( $addr in $Addresses ) <urn:address> <urn:streetAddress>$addr.street</urn:streetAddress> <urn:city>$addr.city</urn:city> <urn:state>$addr.state</urn:state> <urn:postalCode>$addr.postalCode</urn:postalCode> <urn:country>$addr.country}</urn:country> <urn:addressType> <urn:codeSystem>$addr.typeCodeSystem</urn:codeSystem> <urn:codeSystemName>$addr.typeCodeSystemName</urn:codeSystemName> <urn:code>$addr.use</urn:code> <urn:label>$addr.typeName</urn:label> </urn:addressType> </urn:address> #end </fact> </storeDemographicsFactEvent> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: InitializeArrays
recordtarget_patientrole_patient_birthtime_attValue
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['recordTarget']['patientRole']['patient']['birthTime']['@value'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('recordtarget_patientrole_patient_birthtime_attValue', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: HandleMultiplesAndConvertStuff

transformer.inboundTemplate:
POB 891 ESPANOLA NEW MEXICO 87532 US Work Ave ESPANOLA NEW MEXICO 87532 US SMITH BARBARA FAYE Dr. BABS SMITH BARBARA ANN FAYE AHLTA Department of Defense Department of Defense Department of Defense Emergency Contact AGATHA ANN SMITH
Allergies Acute Interstitial Nephritis Elevated blood pressure reading without diagnosis of hypertension Head and neck swelling Rash Vomiting Cephalosporins A/B-CAROTENE/C/BIOFL/B6/MN/ECH (A/B-CAROTENE/C/BIOFL/ PLACEBO (LACTOSE)
Problems Normal heart Renal disorder The coronary arteries Psychiatric disorders
Medications Aspirin (Empirin Eq.) Tablet 325 mg Oral PROVIDER ORDER ENTER BEGIN ONE Acyclovir (Zovirax Eq.) Suspension 200 mg per 5 mL Oral PROVIDER ORDER ENTER BEGIN ONE Pseudoephedrine Sulfate/Loratadine (Claritin-D 12 Hour Eq.) Tablet Controlled/Sustained Release 120-5 mg Oral PROVIDER ORDER ENTER BEGIN ONE

com.webreach.mirth.model.Channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;
